li.span: Texas Comptroller's Annual Local Debt Report

div.div: Welcome to De Leon Independent School District, home of the "Fighting Bearcats". Thank you for taking the time to find out more about our school district and the many excellent programs we have available for our students. De Leon is a wonderful place to educate a child. This environment is made possible by the tremendous parent and community support for our schools, as well as by a hardworking and dedicated staff. De Leon ISD, where there is "Nothing Without Great Effort".
De Leon ISD is pleased to announce that our Accountability Rating for 2018-19 is an overall "A". We are committed to ensuring the success of all our students.
